title: "MRI images reconstructed by artificial intelligence could accelerate and better guide radiotherapy"
excerpt: "An artificial intelligence (AI) that reconstructs MRI images of moving tumours can do so in seconds, offering a significant improvement on current methods to optimise radiotherapy treatment in the clinic."
